title: Browsint
description: A comprehensive browser-based OSINT (Open Source Intelligence) toolkit for cybersecurity professionals and researchers.

title: ShellCy
summary: POSIX Shell in C built from Codecrafters project
description: The Peaky ShellCy is the result of my study of a POSIX compliant shell, capable of interpreting shell commands, running builtin and external programs and more...

title: Browphish
description: Modular toolkit for phishing simulations and social engineering campaings

title: Web3 Pentest Tool
summary: Framework for Web3 smart contract and blockchain security analysis
description: Scalable toolkit for RPC failover, ABI parsing, bytecode inspection and static analysis of Ethereum smart contracts.
features: Config via YAML or environment variables

title: CyberGuard
description: Infrastructure-as-Code system for creating and managing cybersecurity training environments on OpenStack.
features: Live Topology: Real-time visualization of the network graph
Blue Team Ready: Pre-configured SOC node with Wazuh, Suricata, and MinIO
Red Team Ready: Kali Linux node auto-configured
Multi-Tenancy: Support for parallel labs via isolated Terraform states on GitLab

title: IdaMCP - IDA Pro MCP Plugin
summary: Plugin to speed up binary reversing via AI analysis
description: IDA Pro plugin for MCP files analysis that enables users to leverage AI models for binary function analysis.
